section.heading: Child safety helmet assistance program.
section.text: The District Department of Transportation shall adopt a helmet assistance program which shall include grants and discount programs to assist indigent parents and guardians of children under 16 years of age in obtaining safety helmets.

annotations.annotation: as added May 23, 2000, D.C. Law 13-112, § 2(b), 47 DCR 1985
D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction.
D.C. Law 17-184 substituted “District Department of Transportation” for “District of Columbia Department of Public Works”.
